data.text: Nɛ̀i gè ga Piyɛlɛ, gè ga Yesu Kilista ná-keelai, nà ɠa gè sɛʋɛi nii leʋesu GALA ná-nuɓusɛiti wo ma, wɔi é yiimazeɠeai ga woye, wo ga wɛɛinti wo vazagai Pɔn ta Galate yooi zu, naa ʋɛɛ Kapadɔse, ta Azi, ta Ɓitini yooiti su ʋa,
Ɠɛɛɠɛ GALA ge yiimazeɠeni ga woye ma yeeluɠɔ, eɠɛʋelei ná-faazeikpasui la, ná-Zɛnvui zaalai zu, nii é wo ɲadesu ga wo ɠolo Yesu Kilista ʋɛ, wo gba, wo ɠole ga ma ɲamai.
Mamagi ɠa de-Maliɠii Yesu Kilista Kɛɛɠɛ GALA bɛ! Ná-gaazumaawɔinɠaa wolai zu, é zɛnvu niinɛi veeni ade ʋɛ, ga Yesu Kilista wuzeɠe vai, é ɠula saai ya. Naa ɠa é de ya ga kitogi nii é vulua.
Pogani ʋe, é la zooga é ʋa luula, ɓaa é ʋa ɠɔzɔ, ná-pagi la ɠulaa ba. Poganii naa makɛgɛ wo ʋɛ geeɠɔlɔgi zu,
wɔiti é wo makɛsu GALA ná-zɛbɛi zu, kidaaleʋei zaɓui zu, kizogi vaa ma, kɛʋele ɓɛtɛai ga é ɠula kɛlɛma yeeɠɛɠala ɠaaɓelagiti su.
Wa ɠoozunɛɛzu naa zu, anɛɛ ni kɛɛɠeleɠele ge la ná niizu, wo yiiɓɔlɔ yeeɠɛɠala go laawu, ga suɠɔɠɔgi ma ziiti.

Naa ɠa é ɠɛɛzu ga wa-ɠidaaleʋei zuɠɔɠɔgai. Zanugi é ɠoloɠolosu, anɛɛ naa ʋe, su ɠa ɗa ɠɔɠɔ abui ɠa. Zekana é la ga wa-ɠidaaleʋei, nii gola vizɔgai zanugi ʋa, toɠa ɗa lɔ suɠɔɠɔgi zu, naa ɠa a kɛ ná-zɛbɛi ɠwɛɛ. Naazu wa maamusɛi ta lɛbiyai ta bɔɔlɔi zɔlɔɔ, siɛgi zu Yesu Kilista ɠulazu la kɛlɛma.
Wo nɛɛʋɛ ʋɛ, anɛɛ ni wo la ɠɛni kaani. Wa ɠidaaleʋezu ma, anɛɛ ni wo la dɛ kaani niizu. Wa ɠɔkɔsu ga koozunɛɛi nii maawuiɗai, ta nu la zooga suɠulazu,
mazɔlɔɔ wo wa-ɠidaaleʋei ma ungi zɔlɔɔga, wo-yɛnvuiti kizo fai.
GALA goo wo nuiti niiti ti zaalai naa ma vaa woni ma yeeluɠɔ nii GALA ge ʋaazu feezu wo ʋɛ, ti kizo fai nii lɔɔɓɛɛni, ti fɛɠɛlɛfɛɠɛlɛ.

Ti ɠaaɓaani ga ti yeeɠɛɠalaiti ta ti zu vaiti kwɛɛ, é ʋilɛ naama vaiti ba, Kilista ná-Zɛnvui dɛɛzu, mazɔlɔɔ Zɛnvui naa, nii é ɠɛni ti-yiimaʋɛ, é ɠɛni Kilista ná-kpɔlɔ vaiti bosu ma yeeluɠɔ, ta lɛbiyai é ʋaazu sɔlɔɔsu naa ʋolu.

GALA ge dɛɛni ga GALA goo wo nuiti ga keela wooi é veeni ti ya, é la ɠɛni ga tiya ɓɔɠɔi tɔnɔ, kɛlɛ wa ɠa wɔnɔ ɠɛni de. Keela wooi naa laazeelini wo ma niina Woo Niinɛ Ʋagɔi ma lɛnɛbo nuiti zea, niiti ti ma ɓɔɛi woni, Zɛnvu Ɲadegai zɛbɛi zu nii teʋegai, é zeɠe geeɠɔlɔgi zu. Geezuɠeelaiti ɓɔɠɔi wɔin ɠɛni ti ma ga ti kwɛɛ.
Naa ɠa é ba, à wo-ɠigi makɛ, wo ɠɛ ga sɔɓelama nuiti, wa-ɠitogi pɛ ge lo zaalai ʋa, é ʋaazu veezu wo ya, siɛgi zu Yesu Kilista ɠulazu la kɛlɛma.
À ɠɛ ga kolo lointi. À mina ʋilɛ kisiɛiti polu, ti ɠɛni wo-yiimaʋɛ wɔlɔwɔlɔi, siɛgi zu wo ɠɛni la ga faaɠwɛtala nuiti.
Kɛlɛ à ɲade wo ziɛ ʋelei pɛ su, eɠɛʋelei GALA nii é wo loligai, naa ɲadegai la.
Tɔɔzei sɛʋɛʋɛ GALA Sɛʋɛi zu ga: «À ɲade, mazɔlɔɔ ɲàdegɛ.»1:16 Lev 19:2.

Wa-ƓALA falii zu, wa naa lolisu ga Ɠɛɛɠɛ, nii é tukpɔɠaaleʋezu ga sɔledai, é zoloo nui ɠilagilagi ná-kɛɛwotiiti ma. Naa ma, yeeɠɛɠalai kpein é wo ya ga wo kɛ eteai zu, à dɛɛ wo luʋa ʋelei zu ga wa ziɛzu ga GALA gaazuluabai.

Eteai ziɛ ʋelei nii wo-mɛmɛwolani ti zɛni wo ya, naa la ɓena faa nɔpɛ paa nu ma. Kɛlɛ wo suɠwɛɛni ga GALA ge wo ɠeyaʋɛ ga sɔngɔ wola, nii a kɛ é wo unmɔɔ naama etea ziɛgi ma, mazɔlɔɔ é la kɛɛni ga aniiti ta zoo ɠoloɠolosu, eɠɛʋelei walii la, ɓaa zanugi.
Kɛlɛ wo unmɔɔni ga Kilista ma ɲama vizɔgai maaʋele, nii é ɠɛni eɠɛ baala ziʋoi, nii nɛɛʋuzu la ba, kɔzɔzu la ba.
Ziimazeɠegi woni da, aisa eteai ʋa ɓɛtɛ. É ɠulani kɛlɛma yeeɠɛɠala ɠaaɓelagi nii zu, wa-vaa zu.
Tɔun maaʋele ma, wo ɠidaaleʋea GALA ma, nii é buzeɠeni, é kula saai ya, é lɛbiyai ve bɛ. Naa ma, wa-ɠidaaleʋei ta wa-ɠitogi ta GALA ba.
Wo ɓega ʋoluma ga ɠolo gaamai ʋɛ, wo ɓɔɠɔ ɲadega ga, wo wo-ɠɛɛleaiti nɛɛ ʋɛ ga nɛɛbɛi nii wooveleda la su. À ɓɔɠɔ nɛɛ ʋɛ mu wo ɠilagilagi pɛ ga wo-yiimaʋɛ pɛ.
Mazɔlɔɔ wo zɔlɔɔgɛ ʋolu ga niinɛ, naa la ɠɛɛni ga wo-ɠɛɛni saɓu ti zaazu, naati taade, kɛlɛ ga ani zuwui zaala, nii é la zaazu, naa ɠa é ga GALA daawooi, nii é vulua, é yɛsu ná ɠɔ.
Mazɔlɔɔ sɛʋɛʋɛ, é ɠɛ ma:
kɛlɛ Maliɠii laawooi ɠa yɛsu ná ɠɔ.»1:25 Eza 40:6-8 bogɛ é zoloo Gɛlɛke woo zɛʋɛ wɔlɔmai ma.
